intro: Brickellia brasiliensis var. pernambucensis, commonly known as the Pernambuco brickellia, is a flowering plant native to Brazil. It belongs to the family Asteraceae and is characterized by its compact, upright growth habit. The plant produces showy yellow flowers with prominent yellow centers, which bloom in the spring. It thrives in well-drained soils and full sun, making it suitable for rock gardens or dry landscapes. Its ornamental value is enhanced by its drought tolerance and ability to attract pollinators.
